Articles.Content:
Sup guys,

Second time posting here, figured I'd say hello.

Been playing the game since a couple of updates before the Mun was added, and have loved every second of it.

Cheers.

Welcome to the forums! Glad to hear you're enjoying it.

Since you're a veteran player yourself, maybe you could share some of your wisdom with the newer ones over in the How To section of the forums, or even contribute a tutorial to the Drawing Board (link in my sig). There's also plenty of other useful resources there as well, if you want to sharpen your own skills just a little bit more. Maybe you could even tell us about some of your most memorable and interesting missions over in the Mission Reports section, if you're the storytelling type.

Happy landings!
Welcome to the forums! Nice to have another veteran hanging around!
